name: Visual Basic Project Group File
summary: A VBG file contains references to multiple Visual Basic Project ( .VBP ) files, acting as a container that older versions of Microsoft Visual Basic 6.0 used to manage project files within a single group. It links together different Visual Basic projects to organize them, making it easier for developers to work on large applications consisting of several smaller, individual projects.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
